question: The spell that Harry Potter used to bring his broom to him in the triwizard tournament was: True - Accio, False - Aparecium
The charm Expelliarmus causes colorful sparks to fly out of the users wand
The spell Hermione corrects Ron on in their first year was: True - Flipendo, False - Wingardium Leviosa
The three unforgivable curses are Avada Kedavra, Imperio and Crucio
Petrificus Totalus does what: True - causes the victim to laugh hysterically, False - puts the victim in a full body bind
The spell Lumos is used as a light source
The spell Serpensortia produces a snake
What is the counter spell of Alohomora: True-Rennervate, False-Colloportus
The spell duro does what: True-makes the the object harden, False-makes objects soften
The spell that Harry learns from the Half-Blood Prince is Sectumsempra
The spell hocus pocus exsits in the Harry Potter universe
The spell that Gildaroy Lockhart attempts to use on Harry is Obliviate
What spell allows you to conjure a patronous: True-Levicorpus, False- expecto patronum
The spell Incendo produces flowers out of the users wand
The counter spell for Lumos is Nox
What spell is used to amplify voice: True-Impedimenta, False- Sonorus
The spell that repels muggles is Mugawium
The spell Snape uses on Harry to get him to repel Voldemort is Legilimus
